name: Swarovski Attract Trilogy Hoop Earrings, White Round Cut Crystals in a Rhodium Plated Setting
reviews: I‚Äôve had these ear rings for over 3 years! They‚Äôre still very pretty and completely in tact, meaning no Crystals have fallen off, great price for the product and people think they‚Äôre diamonds but I have no issues correcting them, I‚Äôd rather people think I‚Äôm smart than in debt, because I have about 5 different pairs of these SWAROVSKI crystal earrings and necklaces! You can‚Äôt go wrong with these, also I believe if you loose a crystal ( my gold hoops lost a few after 2years) I believe they will replace them. Look into it, I just bought another pair since I had them for 2plus years and because they ended up in the dryer, I‚Äôm sure that didn‚Äôt help. 10/10
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 28 October 2023

name: Swarovski Attract Trilogy Hoop Earrings, White Round Cut Crystals in a Rhodium Plated Setting
reviews: The chain is very short. Fits more like a choker than a necklace and I have a thin neck. Really wish it was about 2 inches longer.

name: Swarovski Attract Trilogy Hoop Earrings, White Round Cut Crystals in a Rhodium Plated Setting
reviews: Ok, so, I don't normally spend nearly ¬£60 on earrings, but I simply had to have them! Anyway,  they're Swarowski , what's not to like! Im suprised theres no certificate but it does use the name 3 times in packaging.  The metal has such a beautiful lustre to it. The crystaks are gawjus too. I love the size, bug if u have quite longish earlobes, don't bother. They just about fit mine, but as u can see they look fine. I want the necklace now lol. Honestly,  I'm thrilled with them. Very comfortable too, I fell asleep in them and no irritation or soreness. I can't praise them enough.  I might have wanted them just a tad bigger/longer, but that's only gripe. They're beautiful as they are, suitable for day or night.  Great looking pair, these are!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 June 2023

El collar y colgante viene en una caja de cart√≥n y luego otra con una magn√≠fica presentaci√≥n de mucha clase de Swarovski, por lo que si lector, est√°s pensando comprarlo para un regalo, la presentaci√≥n es estupenda. En persona se ve un pel√≠n m√°s grande incluso de lo que me imaginaba por lo que bien. Fino y elegante, nada m√°s que pedir.

reviews: Pic on model shows pendant sitting below collarbone. And nice size. Not so. Mine fits as tight as a chokr and the pendant is much smaller than I expected. I'll have to buy a 4-6" extension - yet more cost and assuming I can match the chain - just to be able to wear it comfortably. Needs more realistic images. And maybe a pic of the pendant beside a ruler. Will keep, it's good quality and pretty.

name: Swarovski Attract Trilogy Hoop Earrings, White Round Cut Crystals in a Rhodium Plated Setting
reviews: Earrings are absolutely stunning! They're made with super shiny crystals that catch your eye right away. The design is classy but modern, so you can wear them anywhere. What's great is they're not heavy at all, so you won't feel weighed down wearing them. They're comfy enough for all-day wear, and the way they're put together shows that a lot of care went into making them.Even the box they come in is pretty, which adds to the whole experience. They're also not crazy expensive, so they make a fantastic gift for yourself or someone special.Overall, these earrings are just amazing. They make you feel fancy without being too over the top. Whether you're dressing up for something fancy or just want to add some sparkle to your everyday look, these earrings are perfect.
